title: Fragment, 17th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: supplementary warp forming raised cut and uncut pile in satin foundation (velvet)
provenance: ex. coll. Antonio Vivès y Escudero
dimensions: H x W: 19 x 20.3 cm (7 1/2 in. x 8 in.)
description:
Red diagonal leaves in field of green.
Fragment probally was one end of a maniple. Evidence of a cross can still be seen.
